docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Software that allow anyone to create a status page for their services.

Documentation: https://status-system.juliankorgol.com/ GitHub Repository: https://github.com/JulianKorgol/status-system

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text: Software requirements for the Open-Source Status System.

docs.title: Python
docs.text:
App require:

  • Python 3.10
  • Python pip
  • Python Packages are located under requirements.txt

docs.title: Database
docs.text:
Other databases

We do not support other databases right now, but some of them still could work. Postgres can work if it can process SQL statements condensed under Mariadb.

docs.title: About
docs.text: Open Source project that allow everyone to create a Status Page for their services.
